title: Facile fabrication of a Z-scheme g-C3N5/Gd-MOF/silver nanocube composite as a new generation visible light active photocatalyst for abatement of persistent toxic pollutants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2467-2480
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00913K, Paper
Varsha UshaVipinachandran, Susanta Kumar Bhunia
A ternary composite by combining g-C3N5 and Gd-MOF adorned with AgNCs has been fabricated for the efficient reduction of Cr6+ and neomycin degradation.
